setting.value:
We're very excited to announce the release of the much anticipated update to TVMC for Android, just a couple of weeks behind the Windows and Mac versions. This is not something that you want to miss, it will make your Kodi experience on new devices so much easier.
TVMC is a custom version of Kodi that comes with all the best add-ons and tweaks preconfigured for your enjoyment! Just install and enjoy, no hassles! Please visit the following page for more information: [B][COLOR white]www.tvaddons.ag/tvmc-cordcutters[/COLOR][/B]
Please take the time to share this special release with as many people as possible, send it to your friends, family, coworkers, neighbours, and anyone else you can think of who would enjoy Kodi as much as you do! Thank you again for your support.
